Let's Work Together


I'm an online marketer helping bloggers and business owners grow their traffic through Pinterest focussed marketing.


Working as an online marketer I have helped bloggers like Renee Roaming and Bold Brunette grow a Pinterest audience of 650,000 and 250,000 monthly viewers, and increase blog traffic by 200% and 120% respectively.

If you're interested in growing your business and site through Pinterest, please get in touch using the form below, or email hello@justynjen.com.
